CustomField.description: A class which should implement IInvestorTaxProvidable and will be used to get investor's tax and vat. If blank, it will be taken from Investor's investor tax configuration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An implementation of loan.IInvestorTaxProvidable to provide custom VAT and TAX for all the investors. If blank, VAT and TAX from Investor's Investor Tax Configuration is considered.
CustomField.label: Investor Tax Provider
